languages.text: Авгуры отмечают все новые и новые корабли нелюдей — но большинство из них пребывает в странной прострации. Они... спят? Мертвы? Осторожность велит не проверять эту гипотезу, благо туманности в системе позволят флагману династии скрыться от чужих глаз.

The augurs are spotting more and more xenos vessels, but most of them are in a strange state of dormancy. Are they... asleep? Dead? Cautiousness dictates not to test this hypothesis. Thankfully, the nebulae in the system could allow the dynasty flagship to evade danger.
languages.original_text: Авгуры отмечают все новые и новые корабли нелюдей — но большинство из них пребывает в странной прострации. Они... спят? Мертвы? Осторожность велит не проверять эту гипотезу, благо туманности в системе позволят флагману династии скрыться от чужих глаз.

traits.locale_text: The augurs are spotting more and more non-human vessels, but most of them are in a strange state of prostration. Are they... asleep? Dead? Cautiousness dictates not to test this hypothesis, for the nebulae in the system would allow the dynasty flagship to hide from prying eyes.

The augurs are spotting more and more non-human vessels, but most of them are in a strange state of prostration. Are they... asleep? Dead? Cautiousness dictates not to test this hypothesis, for the nebulae in the system would allow the dynasty flagship to hide from prying eyes.

The augurs are spotting more and more non-human vessels, but most of them are in a strange state of dormancy. Are they... asleep? Dead? Cautiousness dictates not to test this hypothesis, for the nebulae in the system would allow the dynasty flagship to hide from prying eyes.

The augurs are spotting more and more non-human vessels, but most of them are in a strange state of dormancy. Are they... asleep? Dead? Cautiousness dictates not to test this hypothesis, for the nebulae in the system would allow the dynasty flagship to hide from prying eyes.

The augurs are spotting more and more xenos vessels, but most of them are in a strange state of dormancy. Are they... asleep? Dead? Cautiousness dictates not to test this hypothesis. Thankfully, the nebulae in the system could allow the dynasty flagship to evade danger.

The augurs are spotting more and more xenos vessels, but most of them are in a strange state of dormancy. Are they... asleep? Dead? Cautiousness dictates not to test this hypothesis. Thankfully, the nebulae in the system could allow the dynasty flagship to evade danger.

languages.text: Die Auguren orten immer mehr Xenos-Schiffe, aber die meisten von ihnen befinden sich in einem seltsamen Ruhezustand. Schlafen sie? Sind sie tot? Die Vorsicht gebietet, diese Hypothese nicht zu überprüfen. Glücklicherweise konnte das Flaggschiff den Nebel des Systems nutzen, um der Gefahr zu entgehen.
languages.original_text: The augurs are spotting more and more xenos vessels, but most of them are in a strange state of dormancy. Are they... asleep? Dead? Cautiousness dictates not to test this hypothesis. Thankfully, the nebulae in the system could allow the dynasty flagship to evade danger.

traits.locale_text: Die Auguren orten immer mehr Xenos-Schiffe, aber die meisten von ihnen befinden sich in einem seltsamen Ruhezustand. Schlafen sie? Sind sie tot? Die Vorsicht gebietet, diese Hypothese nicht zu überprüfen. Glücklicherweise konnte das Flaggschiff den Nebel des Systems nutzen, um der Gefahr zu entgehen.

languages.text: Les augures repèrent un nombre croissant de vaisseaux xénos, mais la plupart sont plongés dans une torpeur mystérieuse. Sont-ils... endormis ? Morts ? La prudence vous invite à ne pas prendre de risques inconsidérés. Par chance, la nébuleuse présente dans le système pourrait permettre au vaisseau amiral d'échapper à un éventuel danger.
languages.original_text: The augurs are spotting more and more xenos vessels, but most of them are in a strange state of dormancy. Are they... asleep? Dead? Cautiousness dictates not to test this hypothesis. Thankfully, the nebulae in the system could allow the dynasty flagship to evade danger.

traits.locale_text: Les augures repèrent un nombre croissant de vaisseaux xénos, mais la plupart sont plongés dans une torpeur mystérieuse. Sont-ils... endormis ? Morts ? La prudence vous invite à ne pas prendre de risques inconsidérés. Par chance, la nébuleuse présente dans le système pourrait permettre au vaisseau amiral d'échapper à un éventuel danger.

languages.text: Los augures detectan cada vez más naves xenos, pero la mayoría están extrañamente inactivas. Están... ¿dormidas? ¿Muertas? La cautela sugiere no poner a prueba la hipótesis. Por suerte, las nebulosas del sistema permitirían que la nave insignia de la dinastía escape del peligro.
languages.original_text: The augurs are spotting more and more xenos vessels, but most of them are in a strange state of dormancy. Are they... asleep? Dead? Cautiousness dictates not to test this hypothesis. Thankfully, the nebulae in the system could allow the dynasty flagship to evade danger.

traits.locale_text: Los augures detectan cada vez más naves xenos, pero la mayoría están extrañamente inactivas. Están... ¿dormidas? ¿Muertas? La cautela sugiere no poner a prueba la hipótesis. Por suerte, las nebulosas del sistema permitirían que la nave insignia de la dinastía escape del peligro.

languages.text: スキャナーは次々と異種族の船を発見していくが、その多くが奇妙な休眠状態にある。連中は...眠っているのか？死んでるのか？慎重を期して、この仮説については検証しないことにした。ありがたいことに星系には星雲があるため王朝旗艦は危険を回避できる。
languages.original_text: The augurs are spotting more and more xenos vessels, but most of them are in a strange state of dormancy. Are they... asleep? Dead? Cautiousness dictates not to test this hypothesis. Thankfully, the nebulae in the system could allow the dynasty flagship to evade danger.

traits.locale_text: スキャナーは次々と異種族の船を発見していくが、その多くが奇妙な休眠状態にある。連中は...眠っているのか？死んでるのか？慎重を期して、この仮説については検証しないことにした。ありがたいことに星系には星雲があるため王朝旗艦は危険を回避できる。

languages.text: 俄歇矩阵探测到了越来越多的异形舰船，但绝大部分舰船都处于某种古怪的休眠状态。这些异形是……睡着了吗？还是死了？谨慎起见，还是不要贸然检查为好。好消息是，旗舰可以躲在星系的星云之中，避开这些异形舰船的威胁。
languages.original_text: The augurs are spotting more and more xenos vessels, but most of them are in a strange state of dormancy. Are they... asleep? Dead? Cautiousness dictates not to test this hypothesis. Thankfully, the nebulae in the system could allow the dynasty flagship to evade danger.

traits.locale_text: 俄歇矩阵探测到了越来越多的异形舰船，但绝大部分舰船都处于某种古怪的休眠状态。这些异形是……睡着了吗？还是死了？谨慎起见，还是不要贸然检查为好。好消息是，旗舰可以躲在星系的星云之中，避开这些异形舰船的威胁。

languages.text: Alametler, gittikçe daha da fazla zeno gemisi tespit ediyor. Ancak birçoğu, tuhaf bir şekilde faaliyet göstermiyor. Gemiler... Uykuda mı? Ölü mü? Tedbirlilik gereği bu varsayımı teste tabi tutmamak gerek. Neyse ki sistemdeki nebulalar, hanedanlık sancak gemisinin tehlikeden kaçınmasını sağlıyor.
languages.original_text: The augurs are spotting more and more xenos vessels, but most of them are in a strange state of dormancy. Are they... asleep? Dead? Cautiousness dictates not to test this hypothesis. Thankfully, the nebulae in the system could allow the dynasty flagship to evade danger.
